title: Logout
name: DeleteAuth

Success 200.description: A message indicating that the user was logged out.

title: Get information for the current logged user (if there's one)
name: GetAuth

Success 200.description: True if there's an user authenticated, false otherwise.
Authenticated user information (if there's an user authenticated).

title: Login
name: PostAuth

Success 200.description: A message indicating if the login was successful or not.
Detailed information if the login authentication was not successful.

The duration of the song in milliseconds.
If the song contains or not explicit language.
